Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Alglenweis], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Gozreh], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Hshurha], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kostchtchie], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pulura], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Uvuko], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Yamatsumi]

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Winter Bolt]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Diamond Dust]

You control ice, snow, and freezing temperatures.
name: Cold Domain
